Configuring vNIC

vNIC is associated with Boot Policy and Service profile template, this is allow the SPT to determine the vNIC information during server association.

To configure the vNIC, perform the following:

 1. Enter the Name of the vNIC.

 2. Select the appropriate vNIC Template from the drop-down.

 3. Select the desired Ethernet Adapter Policy from the drop-down.

 4. Click Add to generate the vNIC configuration.

Figure 5-9 vNIC Configuration

 5. Click Save and Next to proceed further.
